 2016-07432016-08-05,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectAccess to Cannabis for Medical Purposes Regulations
PrecisACCESS TO CANNABIS FOR MEDICAL PURPOSES REGULATIONS in order to provide Canadians with a greater range of options to access cannabis for medical purposes in order to address the issue of reasonable access as identified by the court.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0230 Publication Date: 2016-08-24
